text: satyaviśvāsikaḷil ninn dānadharm'maṅṅaḷ ceyyān svayaṁ sannad'dharāyi varunnavareyuṁ, svantaṁ ad'dhvānamallāte maṟṟeānnuṁ (dānaṁ ceyyān) kaṇṭettāttavareyuṁ adhikṣēpikkunnavaratre avar. aṅṅane ā viśvāsikaḷe avar parihasikkunnu. allāhu avareyuṁ parihasiccirikkukayāṇ‌. avarkk vēdanayēṟiya śikṣayāṇuḷḷat‌
